name: confront
description: Fully customizable CLI for web apps

scripts.build: npm run css && ./node_modules/.bin/webpack && mkdir -p ./build && cp ./src/index-build.html ./build/index.html && cp ./src/demo.css ./build
scripts.build:bundle: npm run build && npm run build:demo && npm run uglify
scripts.publish:patch: npm run build:bundle && npm version patch && npm publish
scripts.publish:minor: npm run build:bundle && npm version minor && npm publish
scripts.publish:major: npm run build:bundle && npm version major && npm publish
